name: Undercover Agent (itch)
description: You have made your way to the base of the most dangerous bandits, famous for their ingenious robberies. One of them happened recently. Many gold bars were stolen. You are an undercover agent. Your task is to find and collect all the necessary gold bars, leave the base territory. But it's not that simple. After your arrival, the bandits felt something was wrong, so they closed the front door. For greater security, they installed cameras, they themselves walk around the base. Therefore, in order for the operation to be successful, try not to draw attention to yourself. Look for keys, notes, tools. Open safes, doors, break down barricades and take care of your health.
